title: Guest Post: The Supreme Court Should Clarify How to Apply Loper Bright in the Patent Law Case of Lynk Labs, Inc. v. Samsung Co. Ltd.
description:
Prof. Hsieh argues Lynk Labs offers the Supreme Court a chance to show Loper Bright has teeth - before lower courts revive Chevron deference by another name.
Continue reading this post on Patently-O.
content:
By Professor Timothy T.  Hsieh, Associate Law Professor, Oklahoma City University School of Law
